properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 3:09PM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3
to 5 inches across northern Porter County and 1 to 3 inches
across southern Porter County. The snow may fall moderate to
heavy at onset late this afternoon into early this evening, with
visibility under one half miles at times.

* WHERE...Porter County.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Due to the localized nature of lake effect snow,
conditions often vary drastically over short distances. Roads
will likely become snow covered and travel difficult under the
heavier snow band.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling
18002617623.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST MONDAY
